item.title: Github Readme Stats
item.description: I was looking for a guide to configuring spring boot with spring batch admin which i found but then spotted a nice GitHub summary on damienbeaufils home page. Calling this API servive with my account details https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=emeraldjava&show_icons=true&count_private=true returns a neat embedded image. Thanks Damien To ensure the image gets space, we add it to a table. TODO - create a gatsby plugin which takes the url and embeds the image.
